ygData.subject: Double Forward-Slashes in URL
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I m using heritirx 1.14.3 to harvest some material from facebook. My crawl log has lines like this: 2011-01-17T16:05:06.526Z   404      11224

Hi,
I'm using heritirx 1.14.3 to harvest some material from facebook. My crawl log has lines like this:

2011-01-17T16:05:06.526Z   404      11224 http://www.facebook.com//hellethorningschmidt?v=photos&sb=0 X http://www.facebook.com/hellethorningschmidt?v=photos text/html #033 20110117160506113+404 sha1:YWIIR2C2FR3J6ZTH7KCHBPCGTUL4SFPP - content-size:11451

The problem is that the url
a) http://www.facebook.com//hellethorningschmidt?v=photos&sb=0
should be
b) http://www.facebook.com/hellethorningschmidt?v=photos&sb=0

Does anyone know where the extra forward slash is coming from?

--
Colin Rosenthal
IT Developer
State and University Library, Aarhus
